126b8986-77e3-4a45-9ea4-36775602f06b:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"126b8986-77e3-4a45-9ea4-36775602f06b","title":{"en":"Toden-kun"},"altTitles":[{"ja-ro":"Bokuden-kun"},{"ja":"ト伝くん"},{"ja-ro":"Toden-kun (Bokuden-kun)"},{"ja":"卜伝くん"}],"description":{"en":"A family of samurai boys who grew up in the mountains move to the big city of Tokyo!\nThe original boy adventure work drawn by the god of comicalization is back here!\n\n[Synopsis] Bokuden-kun,\nthe 17th generation of Tsukahara Bokuden, a master swordsman who lives deep in the mountains of Gifu, is a terrible coward and always pisses off his father. However, when he picks up the famous sword Rikimaru that was passed down to him by his ancestor, his strength and courage well up...\n\n[Commentary]\n\"Bokuden-kun\", which began serialization in Akita Shoten's \"Boken Ou\" in 1959, is a shonen action manga by Daiji Kazumine, who serialized \"Nanairo Kamen\" in \"Bokura\" in the same year. Readers were captivated by the Popeye-like main character, who is usually a weak boy who suddenly becomes stronger when he picks up a sword, the comical main character's father, and the slightly goofy villain. In the following year, it was made into a TV drama, and it is a work that has accelerated its popularity. This book version will be delivered as a [complete version] that contains all the stories of the manga serialized in \"Boken Ou\". In addition, the obi posted a new cut for the first time in 40 years and a TV drama cut by Mr. Ichimine. I would like you to enjoy the work that has many fans and can be counted as one of Daiji Izumine's representative works."},"links":{"mu":"87m05cq"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"81183756-1453-4c81-aa9e-f6e1b63be016","name":{"en":"Samurai"}}]}

Kang Yerin, after being hit by a truck, wakes up as Ashleigh Lute, the second daughter of a noble household. Without the burden of being the firstborn or the need to earn a living, “Ashleigh” expected to live worry-free. But, what should’ve been a cushy life in high society, soon turns into one life-threatening hassle after another. Pulled in every direction, she is forced to go on a quest to defeat the Demon King, forced to keep her heroic quest a secret, and forced to re-enroll at the academy she left behind years ago, making her a downright “fossil” compared to her peers. Still, anything is better than living with her cold-blooded sister, openly known to have killed her own brother and possibly their parents too. Or so Ashleigh thought until she realized both princes attending the academy were after her allegiance in their pursuit for the throne. Trapped under her murderous older sister’s thumb and stuck between a sibling rivalry over the crown, Ashleigh can never seem to catch a break. In a twisted irony, how hard will Ashleigh Lute have to work to be able to live the easy life she’s always wanted?\n\n---\nAshley Lute, who finally came back home after three years of grueling adventure, returned to the Academy at the request of her sister, Carneline. Already famous as the only returning student, she tried to finish her remaining years at the Academy in peace. However, as the Second Prince Luke and the young lady of the Vellock Duchy approach her, the attention on the newcomer grows even more.\n\nWill Ashley be able to graduate safely?\n\n---\n**Original В отличие от других людей, эта соработница не всегда дружелюбна к новенькой. Доброжелательность при посетителях быстро сменяется злостью и криками вне публики, а некомпетентность недавно присоединившейся сотрудницы лишь усугубляет дело. Но вопреки неприязни девушки, Химэ хочет поладить с каждым во что бы то ни стало. 12fbc8f6-3e20-4cdc-82e8-a1924b4df2c2:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"12fbc8f6-3e20-4cdc-82e8-a1924b4df2c2","title":{"en":"Hokusai Manga"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"北斎漫画"},{"en":"Hokusai's Sketches"}],"relatedIds":["7cb4f146-22d4-43b0-970b-a4830d4bb3f9"],"description":{"en":"Collection of drawings and sketches from famed painter Hokusai.\n\nHokusai Manga is one of the masterpieces by Katsushika Hokusai (1760-1849), a master of Ukiyo-e art, depicting ordinary people s lives, animals, plants, landscapes and human figures, historical and supernatural, even demons and monsters, as if it were a visual encyclopedia, amounting to fifteen volumes. Hokusai Manga turned out to be very popular among every class of people, from feudal lords to the general public, and became a long time best-seller in the Edo period. The original masterpiece spread throughout Japan and flowed into Europe in the middle of the nineteenth century, where it had a striking impact on artists, including Impressionists Manet, Monet, Degas, and others. The artistic movement Japonisme began in part due to its influence."},"links":{"mu":"yiijqzo","raw":"http://www.uragami.co.jp/katsushika_hokusai/index.html"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"36fd93ea-e8b8-445e-b836-358f02b3d33d","name":{"en":"Monsters"}},{"id":"3bb26d85-09d5-4d2e-880c-c34b974339e9","name":{"en":"Ghosts"}},{"id":"3de8c75d-8ee3-48ff-98ee-e20a65c86451","name":{"en":"Animals"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"81183756-1453-4c81-aa9e-f6e1b63be016","name":{"en":"Samurai"}},{"id":"cdad7e68-1419-41dd-bdce-27753074a640","name":{"en":"Horror"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}}]}

거기서 왜 또 후준이 나와?! \n이 인간, 가까이서 보니 모니터 속 모습과 사생활이 완전 식스센스 반전급이다.  \n그래, 이 인간의 이중생활을 이제 정말 낱낱이 파헤쳐주겠다!\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=3817642), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=721457)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.webtoons.com/en/romance/so-i-married-the-antifan/list?title_no=2739)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/suoyiheheifenjiehunle/list?title_no=1374)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/romance/withantifan/list?title_no=1604)\n* [French / Français](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/romance/anti-fan/list?title_no=2308)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.webtoons.com/de/romance/so-i-married-the-antifan/list?title_no=3094)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romance/anti-fan/list?title_no=1597)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000463)\n* [Spanish / Español](https://www.webtoons.com/es/romance/so-i-married-the-antifan/list?title_no=2870)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romance/anti-fan/list?title_no=1600)","pt-br":"Um romance entre o famoso astro do K-pop Hoo Joon e sua repórter oficial anti-fãs Lee Geun-Young, que acabam coabitando...!\n\nAté onde você iria para derrubar a pessoa que você mais odeia? 1332d505-921c-40c0-8770-bd6d07ff4fb4:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"1332d505-921c-40c0-8770-bd6d07ff4fb4","title":{"en":"Shark Wyvern"},"altTitles":[{"ko":"샤크 와이번"},{"en":"Shark 0: Wyvern"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"relatedIds":["9799623f-5a78-4250-8104-aeda96facc62"],"description":{"en":"“Don’t brag about your money in Yeosu, your looks in Suncheon, or your fist in Boseong.” There is an old saying like this, but there was a guy named Hyun Woo-yong who completely defied the warning against boasting about fists in Boseong. He was an 18-year-old high school student.\n\nHyun Woo-yong, who had beaten up not only the delliquents at school but also the gangsters who backed them, ended up getting arrested for causing serious injuries. He served two years in the notorious “True Light Juvenile Detention Center” and was released. Afterward, he headed to Seoul.\n\nAt the age of 21, Woo-yong returned to high school as a second-year student with a single goal in mind: to graduate high school safely and receive his diploma.\n\nHowever, contrary to expectations that it would be an ordinary liberal arts high school, Hanyang High School was a place filled with all sorts of school violence and unfair practices.\n\nInitially, Woo-yong tried to live quietly and endure everything, promising himself to stay composed. However, the actions of the ruthless bullies pushed him to change his mind.\n\nThis is the first project of the ‘Shark’ universe expansion. One morning, he wakes up believing himself to be twenty again. In his mind, he has become the youthful young man that he once was. However, reality fails to keep up with his illusion, and everything around him seems to be quite different from what he is used to. So, he decides that he is simply dreaming. As his reality becomes his dream, his unhappy world turns into a life enriched with happiness and expectations for the future. 13a00bdc-f656-4008-8e10-2193db72ec97:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"13a00bdc-f656-4008-8e10-2193db72ec97","title":{"en":"Teenage NO.1"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"少年NO.1"}],"description":{"en":"\"Aim to be No. 1 in the racing world!!\"\nThe first full-fledged racing work drawn by racing manga specialist Hisashi Sekiya\nhas been reprinted!!\nHiroshi, a car enthusiast, participates in a dangerous race, risking his life!!\nWhat is the true identity of the rival \"Black Lightning\" who doesn't show his true face?\n\nSynopsis\nMinamihiro, a boy who loves cars, runs away from the company after beating up the president's daughter.\nAlthough he is feeling nervous, he catches a bank gang and ends up getting a new job at Hayakawa Motors, a small factory. Hiroshi, who stakes his life on speed, decides to go racing in the Flash, which was built by his father.\nHowever, strong opponents such as the mysterious powerful racer Kuro Inazuma and\nFlash's former driver Kurohara take part in the race.\nWill Hiroshi be able to defeat his many rivals and become No. 1?\n\nExplanation\n\"Shonen No. 1\", which was serialized in \"Shonen Book\" in 1960, is the first\nwork by Hisashi Sekiya, who is known as a racing manga specialist.\nThis is a serious racing manga. When I started serializing this work, \nHisashi Sekiya didn't have a car or a license, and there wasn't much information available, so when he went to great lengths to research cars, he became a car enthusiast. This work's depiction of racing and the way the main character fights can be said to be the prototype for later full-fledged racing manga such as \"Inazuma Yaro'' and \"Barbara!! Racer.'' Also, \"Stop! Nii-chan'' and \"Banzai Tanteichou\".\nYou can see how much of an influence ``Shonen No. 1'' had on Sekiya 's later works from the depiction of carracing.\nThis time, in response to many reprint requests, we have reprinted all 6 volumes of previously published books. The powerful race scenes and comical characters are\na must-see even if you are not a fan of Hisashi Sekiya!!"},"links":{"amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/-/en/関谷ひさし/e/B003UW21PW/ref=dp_byline_cont_book_1","bw":"series/317002/list"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"69964a64-2f90-4d33-beeb-f3ed2875eb4c","name":{"en":"Sports"}}]}

The problem is, she entered the game at its hardest difficulty, and no matter what she does, death awaits her at every ending! Before the \"real daughter\" of Duke Eckart appears, she must choose one of the male leads and reach a happy ending in order to survive. But the two brothers always pick a fight with her over every little thing, as well as a crazy crown prince, whose routes all lead to death. There's even a magician who's enamoured with the female lead, and a loyal slave knight! Di setiap akhir cerita mode normal, tokoh Penelope selalu berakhir dengan kematian di tangan satu dari 5 tokoh pria. Tiba-tiba saja, seorang gadis Korea masuk ke dalam game itu sebagai Penelope Eckart, anak angkat keluarga Duke yang dibenci dan direndahkan semua orang. Dari pengetahuannya di masa lalu, Penelope tahu bahwa ia akan mati dengan mudah jika ia tidak segera mendapatkan hati dari salah satu tokoh pria. Sayangnya, semua tokoh itu adalah orang yang membenci Penelope dan akan membunuhnya jika dia salah langkah. Pilihannya pun terbatas pada Derrick Eckart si kakak angkat yang dingin, Reynold Eckart si kakak angkat yang sering menghina Penelope, Vinter Berdandi si Marquess yang memiliki banyak rahasia, Iklies si budak yang memiliki kemampuan pedang, atau Callisto Regulus si putra mahkota yang menganggap nyawa orang lain sebagai debu. Reputasi Penelope yang buruk dan status di rumahnya sebagai anak angkat yang diabaikan membuat perjalanan hidupnya makin sulit. Mampukan Penelope mengubah pandangan orang terhadapnya dan bertahan hidup?\n\n---\n**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/52654302), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5039321), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/777070260)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EC%97%AD%EC%9D%98-%EC%97%94%EB%94%A9%EC%9D%80-%EC%A3%BD%EC%9D%8C%EB%BF%90/2383), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/54845189)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* English: [KManhwa](https://kmanhwa.com/comics-online/the-villains-ending-is-death/), [Radish](https://radishfiction.com/stories/17108), [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/villains-are-destined-to-die/info), [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/book/villains-are-destined-to-die)\n*Tappytoon and Radish are using the Tapas localization.*\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/8141/)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%8F%8D%E6%B4%BE%E8%A7%92%E8%89%B2%E5%8F%AA%E6%9C%89%E6%AD%BB%E4%BA%A1%E7%B5%90%E5%B1%80/41)\n* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_0000358)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Kematian-adalah-Akhir-Sang-Antagonis/23)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/53075)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%95%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%97%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B1%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%99/47)","it":"Dopo essermi addormentata mentre completavo un gioco attualmente di tendenza, mi sono risvegliata come Penelope Eckhart, la figlia adottiva del Duca Eckhart e malvagia del gioco di simulazione a cui stavo giocando! Il problema è che sono finita nella modalità difficile, e qualunque cosa faccia, a ogni ending mi aspetta la morte! Prima che appaia la \"vera figlia\" del Duca Eckhart, per riuscire a sopravvivere devo scegliere uno dei protagonisti maschili e raggiungere un lieto fine. Ma i miei due fratelli litigano sempre con me per ogni cosa, così come il folle principe ereditario, a cui tutte le strade portano alla morte. C'è perfino un mago innamorato della protagonista femminile e un leale cavaliere schiavo!\n\n---\n**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/52654302), [Naver vou recomeçar até que o destino dessa vilã… Não seja a morte. \n\nNascida e criada como filha ilegítima de uma família rica e dona de conglomerado, ela finalmente conseguiu escapar daquela casa infernal, mas então… acabou sendo transportada para um jogo de simulação de relacionamento e virou a vilã, Penelope Eckhart. Se ela falhar em conquistar um dos cinco personagens principais antes da protagonista do jogo retornar, seu destino será apenas a morte! Пенелопу ненавидят, над ней издеваются, и все считают ее ничтожеством. Сводные братья, отец, кронпринц и даже прислуга желают ей лишь одного - смерти. Каждое неверное слово или поступок ведут к гибели. Чтобы выжить, нужно завоевать сердце хотя бы одного из мужчин. Удастся ли злодейке на этот раз обмануть саму смерть?\n\n---\nЯ перевоплотилась в злодейку, единственную дочь семьи Эккарт. Но самое ужасное — что бы я ни делала, всё приводит меня только к смерти! Я должна сблизиться с кем-то из мужчин гарема героини, прежде чем появится «настоящая дочь» семьи Эккарт!\nДва старших брата, которые всегда ссорятся со мной по любому пустяку. Безумный наследный принц, благодаря которому моя жизнь заканчивается смертью.\n\n*По одноимённому роману Квон Гёыль.*\n\n---\nПенелопа Эккарт перевоплотилась в приемную дочь герцога Эккарта и в злодейку из обратного гарема. Проблема в том, что она вступила в игру в самый трудный момент, и независимо от того, что она делает, в конце ее ждет смерть! Прежде чем появится \"истинная дочь\" герцога Эккарта, она должна стать возлюбленной одного из мужских персонажей и дойти до счастливого финала, чтобы выжить. Но два брата всегда ссорятся с ней из-за каждой мелочи, а также безумный наследный принц, ветка с которым ведет к смерти. Есть даже волшебник, влюбленный в главную героиню, и верный рыцарь-раб! Но, так или иначе, благосклонность мужских персонажей увеличивается еще больше, когда она проводит черту между ними! Это история выживания Пенелопы, которая попала в безумный симулятор свиданий обратного гарема!\n\n---\n**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/52654302), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5039321), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/777070260)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EC%97%AD%EC%9D%98-%EC%97%94%EB%94%A9%EC%9D%80-%EC%A3%BD%EC%9D%8C%EB%BF%90/2383), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/54845189)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* English: [KManhwa](https://kmanhwa.com/comics-online/the-villains-ending-is-death/), [Radish](https://radishfiction.com/stories/17108), [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/villains-are-destined-to-die/info), [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/book/villains-are-destined-to-die)\n*Tappytoon and Radish are using the Tapas localization.*\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/8141/)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%8F%8D%E6%B4%BE%E8%A7%92%E8%89%B2%E5%8F%AA%E6%9C%89%E6%AD%BB%E4%BA%A1%E7%B5%90%E5%B1%80/41)\n* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_0000358)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Kematian-adalah-Akhir-Sang-Antagonis/23)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/53075)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%95%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%97%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B1%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%99/47)","sr":"Opsednuta sam ovom igrom! Kao da je zavladala mojim životom… čekaj - AKTIVIRAN TEŠKI REŽIM. Ne-ne-ne-ne-ne! Bukvalno me je uzela i bacila u ulogu Penelope Eckhart. Ljubav je laka kad si heroina, ali kao omraženi negativac, trudim se da ne umrem… od ruke moje braće… princa… viljuške…svaki mogući kraj je smrt! Ovaj svet je naslagan protiv mene, ali mogu li moja pamet i znanje o igrama postići ljubav od ovih muških likova? Ili dugme za resetovanje???","tr":"Penelope Eckart; Dük Eckart'ın evlatlık kızı ve harem partner simülatörünün kötü karakteri olarak reenkarne oldum. Sorun şu ki, oyuna en zor seviyede girdi ve ne yaparsa yapsın, her seferinde ölümle burun buruna geliyor! Dük Eckart'ın \"gerçek kızı\" ortaya çıkmadan önce, erkek ana karakterlerden birini seçmeli ve hayatta kalmak için mutlu bir sona ulaşmalıdır. Ama bu iki kardeş onunla her zaman, en ufak bir şeyde bile kavgaya tutuşuyor. Bununla birlikte rotaları ölüme yol açan çılgın bir veliaht prens, dişi kurşunla büyülenmiş bir sihirbaz ve sadık bir köle şövalyesi bile var! Ama nasıl oluyorsa, ne zaman çizgiyi aşsa ana karakterler ile olan aşk ölçeri yükseklik gösteriyor!\n\nİşte bu çılgın bir harem simülasyonunun içinde tıkalı kalmış Penelope'un hikayesi.\n\n---\n**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/52654302), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5039321), With his flashy clothes and his frank personality, Kiriaki’s strangeness immediately caught Homura’s attention. After spending their days after school together in the art room, Homura begins to fall in love with Kiriaki. And one day, Homura asks Kiriaki if he will model for his painting. Diese verkauft sie dann bei der Abenteurergilde im nahegelegenen Dorf. Zudem sammelt sie auch noch Heilkräuter und wurde so zur respektierten „Hexe der Hochebene“.  \n  \nNachdem sie das 300 Jahre lang gemacht hat, hat sie so viel Erfahrungspunkte gesammelt, dass sie unabsichtlich Level 99, das höchste, erreicht hat. So wurde sie zur stärksten Hexe überhaupt.  \n  \nSo wird ihr eigentlicher Lebensplan durch verschiedene Sachen durcheinander gebracht: mal kommt ein Drache vorbei, dann der Dömonen-Lord Beelzebub, und noch viele mehr. Other than that, she passes the time collecting medicinal herbs, and became known as the respected and trusted \"Witch of the Highlands.\"  \n  \nHowever, as a result of farming slimes every day for 300 years, she gained too much experience, and unknowingly became level 99 – the world's strongest witch.","ru":"Айдзава Адзуса — самая обычная офисная служащая, которая умерла от переутомления. It was such a monster program that \"children disappeared from public bathhouses\" during its airing time.\n\nAlthough \"Moonlight Mask\" has been adapted into manga by many mangaka, it was not until three months after the start of the TV program that the story was told in the form of a manga.\n\nThe popularity of Jiro Kuwata's version, which was serialized in Kodansha's \"Shonen Club\" three months after the TV drama started, was overwhelming and contributed greatly to the increase in the magazine's circulation. \n\nThe biggest reason for this was that Kuwata was good at what he did. The thrilling action scenes produced by Kuwata's sharp touch, was his forte. Giờ đây một Toru Eiban mới trên hành trình của riêng mình sẽ khám phá về sự thật về sức mạnh của mình và chữa lành những tổn thương trong lòng"},"links":{"al":"130938","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0B1Q9D82Y","ap":"keikenchi-chochiku-de-nonbiri-shoushin-ryokou","bw":"series/319278/list","cdj":"https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-2644839","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/657051/","kt":"keikenchi-chochiku-de-nonbiri-shoushin-ryokou-yuusha-to-koibito-ni-tsuihou-sareta-senshi-no-mujikaku-zama","mal":"143923","mu":"178694","nu":"a-warrior-exiled-by-the-hero-and-his-lover","raw":"https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_AM19202134010000_68/"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"erotica","tags":[{"id":"36fd93ea-e8b8-445e-b836-358f02b3d33d","name":{"en":"Monsters"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"39730448-9a5f-48a2-85b0-a70db87b1233","name":{"en":"Demons"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"97893a4c-12af-4dac-b6be-0dffb353568e","name":{"en":"Sexual Violence"}},{"id":"a1f53773-c69a-4ce5-8cab-fffcd90b1565","name":{"en":"Magic"}},{"id":"aafb99c1-7f60-43fa-b75f-fc9502ce29c7","name":{"en":"Harem"}},{"id":"b29d6a3d-1569-4e7a-8caf-7557bc92cd5d","name":{"en":"Gore"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"dd1f77c5-dea9-4e2b-97ae-224af09caf99","name":{"en":"Monster Girls"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}

The strength and the prosperity of these races not only depends on their own growth, but also on human belief and worship of them.   \n  \nHowever, as more people in modern society believe less in them, the more their numbers and strength diminish. Although there are still some powerful and ancient beings, they can only try their best to hide in corners of the world or pretend to be human.   \n  \nOn the other hand, there are other races with dark purposes who call themselves the \"Devil Hunter Association\". In order not to be discovered by the demon hunters and not targeted by humans, various races worked hard to integrate into human society.  \n\n\n---\n\n**Links**:  \n- [Original manhua (Bilibili)](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28843)"},"links":{"ap":"wild-lilies-and-violets","mu":"176318","raw":"https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/649061"},"originalLanguage":"zh","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"36fd93ea-e8b8-445e-b836-358f02b3d33d","name":{"en":"Monsters"}},{"id":"39730448-9a5f-48a2-85b0-a70db87b1233","name":{"en":"Demons"}},{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"a3c67850-4684-404e-9b7f-c69850ee5da6","name":{"en":"Girls' Love"}},{"id":"b29d6a3d-1569-4e7a-8caf-7557bc92cd5d","name":{"en":"Gore"}},{"id":"cdad7e68-1419-41dd-bdce-27753074a640","name":{"en":"Horror"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}
